name: external_org_migration_finished
desc: An enterprise grid migration has finished on an external workspace..
long_desc: My Slack API Start herenew App features Messaging Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Resources Community An enterprise grid migration has finished on an external workspace. Compatibility:Â RTM The external_org_migration_finished event is sent to all connections when an external workspace completes to migrate to an Enterprise Grid. The team indicates the external workspace that is migrating. The date_started indicates the time the external workspace started to migrate. The date_finished indicates the time the external workspace finished to migrate.
